name: Brad Pitt Red Coat Leather Jacket
description:
The offered Leather Jacket made of 100% genuine high grade Sheep Leather. It is the inspired replica of the one worn by Brad Pitt, as Tyler Durden in the 1999 movie FIGHT CLUB. This is as close as you will find to the real thing. The Jacket has following unavoidable features to own,

 

ð       100% Genuine High Grade Sheep Leather

ð       Exact Replica worn by Brad Pitt with White Stitching.

ð       Light Weight because of Sheep Leather

ð       Fully Lined

ð       Two Bags Outside

ð       Two Pockets Insides 

ð       High Grade Product in Introductory Price

ð       Replicated by Highly skilled Pakistani People

ð       Sizes XS to 5XL
